body: I offer a Pugh Decision matrix. My criteria include perspicuity impacts (source complexity, size). I also forced ranked the criteria to determine the weights for the criteria. Your own may vary of course. I used "interfaces" as the default alternative and compared this to "copy/paste" generics, template based generics (I had in mind something like how D language works), and something I called runtime instantiation style generics. I'm sure this is a vast over simplification. Nonetheless, it may spark some ideas on how to evaluate choices... this should be a public link to my Google Sheet, [here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/19CnOu4fAwQ4F9JsllGM2sFCBUkmYjdMfAMZA7-ByDZI/edit?usp=sharing)
